title: Hindenburg has never been a client of the firm, Kotak Mahindra International says
description: Kotak Mahindra International Limited (KMIL) clarified on Tuesday that Hindenburg has never been a client or investor of the firm. The company made the statement to address any confusion regarding their relationship with Hindenburg.
